remarks: Convert an operation associative law to class notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jun-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
statement:
caovassg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x F y ) F z ) = ( x F ( y F z ) ) ) $.
caovassg $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S /\ C e. S ) ) -> ( ( A F B ) F C ) = ( A F ( B F C ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.

$d S x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
